question.body: Which of the following is a requirement for both the skeletal muscle and respiratory pumps to work?

response.feedback: Correct. The valves are necessary to maintain one way flow as these two systems affect venous pressures.
Incorrect. Although the skeletal muscle pump is functional in the standing position, the respiratory pump can be effective even while lying down.
Incorrect. These pumps help generate the venous pressure; however, it does not have to be high initially for the pumps to work.
